dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, big news out of Washington, uh, this week. President Trump actually vetoed the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, big news out of Washington, uh, this week. President Trump actually vetoed the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Donald Trump signed a bill on Wednesday that supports the pro-democracy protests in Hong Kong, after days of uncertainty surrounding his willingness to confront Beijing as he attempts to hammer out a trade deal with China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I mean, it's pretty wild, right? This bill, it passed almost unanimously through both houses of Congress just last week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I mean, it's pretty wild, right? This bill, it passed almost unanimously through both houses of Congress just last week.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The bill, the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act, was passed almost unanimously by both houses of Congress last week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Which felt like a clear rebuke of his stance, you know? And Beijing, they were quick to praise the veto.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Which felt like a clear rebuke of his stance, you know? And Beijing, they were quick to praise the veto.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The provided article does not mention Beijing's reaction to President Trump's action.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. And, like, this bill itself, it was really meant to ensure the U.S. was assessing China's actions on Hong Kong's autonomy and civil liberties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. And, like, this bill itself, it was really meant to ensure the U S was assessing China's actions on Hong Kong's autonomy and civil liberties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It would... require the State Department to give Congress annual reports assessing whether China has encroached on Hong Kongs autonomy or clamped down on civil liberties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's the kicker. The veto means we won't be getting those annual reports, you know, officially tracking how China's encroaching on their freedoms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's the kicker. The veto means we won't be getting those annual reports, you know, officially tracking how China's encroaching on their freedoms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Donald Trump signed a bill on Wednesday that supports the pro-democracy protests in Hong Kong... It would... require the State Department to give Congress annual reports assessing whether China has encroached on Hong Kongs autonomy or clamped down on civil liberties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Trump, he said he vetoed it to show solidarity with President Xi and China, and the people of Hong Kong. It's all about that trade deal, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Trump, he said he vetoed it to show solidarity with President Xi and China, and the people of Hong Kong. It's all about that trade deal, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a statement announcing the signing, Trump said he signed the bill out of respect for President Xi, China and the people of Hong Kong.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. He even said last week, on Fox, that we "must stand with China, and not Hong Kong." Pretty blunt.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. He even said last week, on Fox, that we must stand with China, and not Hong Kong. Pretty blunt.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In an interview on Fox and Friends last week, Trump said, We have to stand with Hong Kong, but Im also standing with President Xi, when asked if he would sign the bill.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Very blunt. And Senator Marco Rubio, who, um, commented on the veto, he was pretty scathing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Very blunt. And Senator Marco Rubio, who, um, commented on the veto, he was pretty scathing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following last weekends historic elections in Hong Kong that included record turnout, this new law could not be more timely in showing strong U.S. support for Hong Kongers long-cherished freedoms. I look forward to continuing to work with the administration to implement this law.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he said the U.S. now has "limited and meaningless tools" to influence Beijing, which is, like, a huge deal for Hong Kong.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he said the U S now has limited and meaningless tools to influence Beijing, which is, like, a huge deal for Hong Kong.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The U.S. now has new and meaningful tools to deter further influence and interference from Beijing into Hong Kongs internal affairs, said Senator Marco Rubio, who introduced the bill.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Especially after those recent elections there, right? With all the protests. This just feels like such weak U.S. support.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially after those recent elections there, right? With all the protests. This just feels like such weak U S support.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. I mean, the protests, they started months ago over that extradition bill.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. I mean, the protests, they started months ago over that extradition bill.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pro-democracy protests erupted in the semiautonomous region of Hong Kong months ago over a bill that would extradite those accused of committing a crime in Hong Kong to mainland China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. And now it's just this broader movement against Beijing's control.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. And now it's just this broader movement against Beijing's control.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While the bill has been withdrawn from consideration, the protests have become a larger movement against Beijings control over the city, sometimes devolving into violent clashes between protesters and police officers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, this veto, it just... it complicates things further for Hong Kongers fighting for their freedoms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, this veto, it just... it complicates things further for Hong Kongers fighting for their freedoms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Donald Trump signed a bill on Wednesday that supports the pro-democracy protests in Hong Kong...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Rubio said it "could not be more detrimental" in showing weak U.S. support. It leaves them in a pretty tough spot, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Rubio said it could not be more detrimental in showing weak U S support. It leaves them in a pretty tough spot, honestly.
